duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble, test, and troubleshoot batteries and related components in the production facility.
Monitor and maintain battery production equipment, troubleshoot production issues, and track production data.
Test and inspect battery cells, adjust production process parameters, and ensure optimal production.
Follow safety procedures, maintain a clean work area, and collaborate with production and engineering teams.
Assist with product development processes and maintain inventory of raw materials and components.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required. Battery Safety Course preferred.
